trends: There has been one other sighting in Grant
There were no other sightings in Grant on or around August 13th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife took some panoramic photos while we were hiking the Abyss Lake Trail, which is located within the Mt. Evan wilderness area. The area we were hiking in is located 8-10 miles north of Grant, CO off of Guanella Pass Rd. We have a before and after photo, in which we cannot ascertain the identity of the object in one of our photos. If possible we would really like to have a second set of eyes to review the before and after photo. I can be reached @ 720-583-0569 for any further info. My wife, who is a serious skeptic of these cases has really come to question her beliefs in these matters. We are both open to any further questions. Please contact us.
Summary: Review of panoramic photo after the fact.
